messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI_Dragos_Nodes File Padding Node?

The primary purpose of the ComfyUI_Dragos_Nodes File Padding Node is to check a folder for .png files and return a padded string based on the number of files present. For example, if the folder contains 3 .png files and you set the padding to 4, it will output the string '0003'.
How does the VAE Loader with Name output node work?
The VAE Loader with Name output node allows you to select a VAE and provides its name along with the VAE itself.
What is the functionality of the WLSH KSampler Image Info node?
The WLSH KSampler Image Info node takes various inputs and formats them into a user-friendly, easy-to-read format. Some of the inputs are optional, and these nodes can be chained together.
What is the Extra workflow component intended for?

The Extra workflow component is meant to be used in conjunction with the [ComfyUI-Workflow-Component](https://github.com/ltdrdata/ComfyUI-Workflow-Component#comfyui-workflow-component) repository. The file can be modified by renaming `file_padding.component.json` to `file_padding.json`.
